data.name: description
data.value: Passionate about software development using languages like Java, Python and JavaScript, eager to contribute to innovative projects.

data.name: descriptionAboutMe
data.value: Aspiring Computer Science student with a passion for software development and a strong foundation in various programming languages and frameworks. Proficient in Java + Spring Boot, Python + Django, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Angular. Eager to apply and expand my skills through practical experiences and collaborative projects. Known for problem-solving abilities, attention to detail, and a continuous drive to learn and improve. Seeking opportunities to contribute to innovative projects and grow professionally in the tech industry.

data.name: project1Description
data.value: Developed a comprehensive online bookstore management system using Java and Spring Boot. The application supports user authentication, book catalog management, and order processing. Implemented RESTful APIs for communication between the frontend and backend, ensuring secure and efficient data handling. Integrated a MySQL database for storing user information, book details, and order records.

data.name: project2Description
data.value: Created a web-based personal finance tracker using Python and Django. The application allows users to track their income, expenses, and savings. Designed a responsive user interface and implemented Django's ORM for efficient database interactions.

data.name: project3Description
data.value: Developed a dynamic task management dashboard using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Angular. The application helps teams manage their projects and tasks efficiently. Implemented a drag-and-drop interface for task organization and a real-time notification system for updates.
